definitions.definition: To react , using fermentation ; especially to produce alcohol by aging or by allowing yeast to act on sugars ; to brew .
To stir up, agitate , cause unrest or excitement in.

main_definition: To react , using fermentation ; especially to produce alcohol by aging or by allowing yeast to act on sugars ; to brew .
secondary_definitions: To stir up, agitate , cause unrest or excitement in.
